p.k: Joo Hongbin, the CEO of a game company, has got everything. He is capable, rich and even good-looking! However, this perfect guy lacks in one thing
p.d: Joo Hongbin, the CEO of a game company, has got everything. He is capable, rich and even good-looking! However, this perfect guy lacks in one thing. He is so ill-tempered! The worst guy on the planet! One rainy day, this supercilious guy turns into a monster. When he gets angry, the blades spring out from his body. Moreover, Sedong, a woman with a bright personality and Chang, his first love's son appear making him confused...
